p: Besides well-studied pharmacological effects like anticancer, antidiabetic, antioxidant, and anti-inflammatory activities, S. nervosum extract and its chemical compositions were also investigated in other bioassays, such as cardiotonic, antibacterial, anticaries, cellular protective, and antiosteoclastogenic activities. However, these studies are currently in the early stage, which requires further works on the mechanism of action and animal models to support future clinical application.
